headline: Edison International downgraded to Neutral from Buy at Guggenheim
summary: Guggenheim downgraded Edison International (EIX) to Neutral from Buy with a price target of $60, down from $91. The firm, which shuffled ratings in the utilities sector, argues that the group is “oversold, undervalued” and should outperform in 2025. In its ratings reworking, the firm upgraded six stocks to Buy and downgraded four to Neutral, adding that utilities are “not an interest rate call, not a yield call… it’s a GARP call,” describing the sector as offering “growth at a reasonable price.”
